cyber-.translation[0].definitions[0].def: relating to computers, especially to messages and information on the Internet
cyber-.translation[1].definitions[0].def: used to form words that refer to activities involving the use of computers rather than the real world, especially activities on the Internet
cyber-.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: People are discovering the endless amount of information in cyberspace.
attempts to halt the spread of cybercrime
